resources.string: 1. Click the Generate Button below to get started !!
2. Then you will be asked to click the photo of the questions with its options.
4. Adjust the error and options to your match.
5. Select the add button to add it to the list of questions in your quiz.
6. Screen displaying the list of questions will appear. If you wish to add a question click add else exit.
7. After exiting, If you wish to add a timer set the timer.
